title: Boston Fleet remain undefeated behind another shutout performance from Aerin Frankel
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: PWHL “It's like a Christmas present that came early.
" Aerin Frankel has allowed one goal in three games this year.
Danielle Parhizkaran/The Boston Globe ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Noah Kahan promises you won’t have to wait ‘Forever’ for his new album
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Music The Vermont native has repeatedly teased the album’s release on social media and launched a pre-sale website this week.
Noah Kahan performs during a Nov.
20 benefit concert for the Busyhead Project and Red Sox Foundation at MGM Music Hall.

title: Dangerous TikTok skiing trend leads to ‘preventable’ rescues on Vermont slope, rescuers say
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Skiing Amid an uptick in rescue operations during an early ski season, rescuers say at least one lost group was inspired by social media.
Stowe Mountain Rescue said an uptick in rescue operations on Mount Mansfield may be due to a TikTok trend.
Stowe Mountain Rescue ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: 2 people enter Orange Line tracks from train after train stops, opens doors in between stations, MBTA says
author: Audrey Cooney
bullets: Local News "While the doors were open, the train never moved.
… Two passengers exited the train into the track area – they did not fall out, but exited on their own,” an MBTA spokesperson said.
A person was hospitalized with minor injuries after they and another person left an Orange Line train that was stopped just outside a station on Wednesday, the MBTA said.

title: Why Cole Ragans should be Red Sox’ top offseason target
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox Ragans would form a devastating 1-2 punch atop Boston's rotation with Garrett Crochet.
Cole Ragans would be another power arm in Boston's rotation.
Barry Chin/Globe Staff ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Person missing in Merrimack River, search will resume Thursday
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News Rescue crews in Newburyport have been searching for the missing person since about 8 a.
m.
Wednesday.

title: New 2026 NFL mock draft has Patriots adding 6-foot-7 offensive lineman
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “The Patriots’ new team motto: Protect Drake Maye at all costs.
" Monroe Freeling would give New England another imposing presence on their O-line.
AP Photo/George Walker IV The 2025 Patriots are staying focused on the task at hand amid an 11-2 start to the season.

title: Jaylen Brown listed as doubtful for Celtics’ Thursday game against Washington with a non-COVID illness
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics Brown's illness has put his status for Thursday's game in doubt.
Jaylen Brown AP Photo/Phil Long The Celtics listed Jaylen Brown as doubtful for Thursday’s matchup against the Wizards on their latest injury report, citing a non-COVID illness.
Brown has played in all 21 of the Celtics’ games so far this season.

title: What does Drake ‘Drake Maye’ Maye mean? Even Mike Vrabel and Kayshon Boutte aren’t sure
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "I couldn’t even figure out 6-7, and now it’s Drake ‘Drake Maye’ Maye" Vrabel said of the trend.
Drake Maye John Tlumacki/The Boston Globe Having a nickname cited in quotation marks is nothing new, especially in sports.
There’s Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson in wrestling.

title: White Castle automated kiosk debuts at Logan Airport
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Food News It will serve sliders in under two minutes.

Travelers at Boston Logan International Airport can now grab White Castle's hot and tasty beef and chicken Sliders on demand through new automated kiosk partnership White Castle Boston Logan welcomed a surprising new arrival — an automated White Castle slider kiosk.
At first glance, it might look like your average airport vending machine.
